code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TournamentList(){const[tournaments,setTournaments]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/tournaments').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setTournaments(data)).catch(err=>setError('Error al cargar torneos'));},[]);const handleEdit=tournament=>{localStorage.setItem('editTournament',JSON.stringify(tournament));window.location.href="/editar-torneo/".concat(tournament.id);};const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/tournaments/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});setTournaments(tournaments.filter(t=>t.id!==id));}catch(err){setError('Error al eliminar torneo');}};const handleCalendar=id=>{window.location.href="/torneo/".concat(id,"/calendar");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Torneos creados"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),tournaments.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No hay torneos registrados"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tournaments.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:t.name})," \u2014 ",t.startDate," a ",t.endDate,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("em",{children:t.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:t.rules}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleEdit(t),children:"\u270F\uFE0F Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(t.id),style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCalendar(t.id),style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},children:"\uD83D\uDCC5 Calendar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]},t.id))})]});}export default TournamentList;
